response.overview: Directed by Shahbano Farid, Karachi at Night offers a glimpse into the DIY roots of Pakistan's nightlife culture, documenting how local artists overcome cultural and structural obstacles to push electronic music in the metropolis. Featuring insights from Kukido, Lyla and Rudoh, among others, the film documents the scene's growth and its potential to continue flourishing into the future.
response.title: Karachi at Night
